detectCmp.exists: body > div#notice-cookie-block > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a:nth-child(2)#refuse_cookies

detectPopup.visible: body > div#notice-cookie-block > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a:nth-child(2)#refuse_cookies

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#notice-cookie-block > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a:nth-child(2)#refuse_cookies

test.waitForVisible: body > div#notice-cookie-block > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a:nth-child(2)#refuse_cookies
